doc.title: Arthritis: An Integrated Approach
doc.plot: Where complementary, alternative and orthodox practices meet, we have integration. Visionhealth was created in 2005 with the specific goal of collecting the highest quality and the most detailed information available on incredibly widespread chronic ailments and making it available to sufferers worldwide. In "ARTHRITIS an integrated approach", we explore: orthodox methodologies and some powerful and efficacious alternatives including - acupuncture, environmental medicine, electromagnetic therapy, nutritional medicine, chi gung, herbal medicine, heat therapy, provocation neutralization, breathing, massage, yoga, meditation, homeopathy, kairos, bi-aura, sea spray therapy and more. Featuring some of the worlds foremost experts, topics covered include: diet, allergies, food sensitivities, chemical sensitivities, sick building syndrome, the environment, the candida yeast problem, stress, the emotions, organic food, moulds and mycotoxins, heavy metals and nutrition.
